usecase.name: Chat with AI bot
usecase.description: Every user can chat with an AI bot and take help from it
steps: User should be on the chat page
User can type in the chat box and get the response from the bot

testcases.name: Empty text submit
testcases.description: Verify the response when user submits empty text

testcases.name: Text more than 1000 characters
testcases.description: Check the response when user submits text more than 1000 characters

expected.outcome: First 1000 characters will be sent and the user will be notified about the limit
